description: Display of Christmas Decorations at: Regent Street - 25 x crossings comprising 4 x Gateway decorations with LED screens and animation and 16 x cross street decorations with 3D nets; Regent Street St James' - 5 x cross street decorations; Jermyn Street - 10 x cross street decorations; St James' Market - 6 x cross street decorations, 1x floor mounted decoration, living wall decorations and additional lighting; Waterloo Place - 1 x 10m tree;Glasshouse Street - 16 x projectors on catenary wires, projecting white starry bursts onto the pavement and building facades, 7 x displays around existing tree planters with gold cladding of the planters and spiral frame with white LED illuminated wings and text and 3x cross-street displays suspended on catenary wires;Swallow Street - 1x cross-street display suspended from existing fixings;Swallow Street - 2x projectors on existing fixings, projecting white starry bursts onto the pavement for a temporary period.
